ProductAttributeDefinition.name: ProductAttributeDefinition
ProductAttributeDefinition.description: Represents the relationship between a product and its attributes.

AttributeCategoryId.description: The ID of the attribute category assigned to the parent object.

AttributeDefinitionId.description: The ID of the attribute associated with the product.

AttributeNameOverride.description: The name to display for the attribute when shown for this object. This display name overrides the name on the attribute. For example, the attribute "Color" is overridden to display as "Laptop Color." The maximum size is 255 alphanumeric characters. The name can include these special characters: @ ! - < > * ? + = % # ( ) / \ & ‘ £ € $ ”.

DefaultValue.description: The default value for the product attribute. The attribute value can be changed. This default overrides the default value set for a picklist for the attribute.

Description.description: A description of the attribute definition. The maximum size is 32,000 alphanumeric characters. The description can include these special characters: @ ! - < > * ? + = % # ( ) / \ & ‘ £ € $ ”.

DisplayType.description: The type to display data for the selected data type.

HelpText.description: The help text to display when end users are configuring this attribute. This field overrides the help text defined for the attribute itself.

IsHidden.description: Indicates if this product attribute is hidden from end users in the run time (true) or not (false).

IsPriceImpacting.description: Indicates whether this attribute dictates the price of a product (true) or not (false).

IsReadOnly.description: Indicates whether the attribute is read-only for users in the run time (true) or not (false).

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether this attribute requires a value when assigned to a parent object (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the product attribute was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the product attribute was last viewed.

MaximumCharacterCount.description: The maximum number of characters that can be entered for an attribute value.

MaximumValue.description: The maximum value that can be entered as an attribute value.

MinimumCharacterCount.description: The minimum number of characters that can be entered for an attribute value.

MinimumValue.description: The minimum value that can be entered as an attribute value.

Name.description: The name of the product attribute.

OverriddenProductAttributeDefinitionId.description: The ID associated with the overridden product attribute definition.

OverrideContextId.description: The ID associated with the root product record in a bundle.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the product attribute definition.

Product2Id.description: The product ID associated with the product attribute definition.

ProductClassificationAttributeId.description: The ID of the attribute assigned to the product classification.

Sequence.description: The display sequence of the attribute when configuring the product during run time.

Status.description: The lifecycle state of the product attribute definition.

StepValue.description: The increment or decrement by which a slider's value changes as the user adjusts the product attribute value. Available in API version 61.0 and later.

ValueDescription.description: The description of the value assigned to this attribute. This field takes on the value description from the attribute definition.
